thread.title: Heather Watson beats Bethanie Mattek-Sands at Abierto Mexicano Telcel
thread.title_full: Heather Watson beats Bethanie Mattek-Sands at Abierto Mexicano Telcel

title: Heather Watson beats Bethanie Mattek-Sands at Abierto Mexicano Telcel
text:
Read more about sharing. Heather Watson, the world number 73, overcame Bethanie Mattek-Sands who is ranked 164 in the world Heather Watson moved into the second round of the Abierto Mexicano Telcel with a straight sets win over Bethanie Mattek-Sands. 
The Briton double-faulted 10 times as she struggled with her serve but was still able to see off her American opponent 7-5 6-3 in Acapulco. 
Watson, 24, plays second seed Kristina Mladenovic of France in round two. 
Fellow Briton Kyle Edmund plays Sam Querrey of the US in the men's draw later on Tuesday. Share this page
